The [x3ptools package](https://heike.github.io/x3ptools/) contains tools to work with data in x3p format.

The x3p file format is specified in ISO standard 25178-72:2017/AMD 1:2020 (based on ISO ISO5436 -- 2000) to describe 3d surface measurements.
